      • getID

        public int getID()
        Returns the identifier of this node. Standard set to UNKOWN_ID (0xFE or 254)
        Returns:
        int

      • setID

        public boolean setID(String _id)
        Parameters:
        _id - the desired identifier between 0-255 (254 is reserved for UNKNOWN_ID) Sets the identifier of the node to the specified id
        Returns:
        boolean

      • setID

        public boolean setID(int _id)
        Sets the identifier of the node to the specified id. Should be between (0-255, excluding 254)
        Parameters:
        _id - the desired identifier between 0-255 (254 is reserved for UNKNOWN_ID)
        Returns:
        boolean Returns true if the node identifier was changed succesfully

      • setXBeeAddress16

        public boolean setXBeeAddress16(int msb,
                       int lsb)
        Attempts to set the 16-bit network address of this node to the specified values. The first value should represent the most significant byte (MSB) the second the least significant byte (LSB)
        Parameters:
        int -
        int -
        Returns:
        boolean Returns true if the address has successfully been updated.
